title: React for Beginners

title: JavaScript Essentials
description: Understand variables, functions, loops, objects, and modern ES6+ features.

title: HTML & CSS Bootcamp
description: Build modern and responsive web pages using HTML5 and CSS3.

title: Node.js Backend Basics

title: Full-Stack Project
description: Develop a complete full-stack application using React and Node.js.

title: TypeScript Masterclass
description: Improve your JavaScript projects with TypeScript types, interfaces, and generics.

title: Python Fundamentals
description: Learn Python basics, including variables, functions, loops, and file operations.

title: SQL & Databases
description: Master SQL queries, joins, constraints, indexes, and relational database concepts.

title: Advanced Git & GitHub

title: APIs with Express & MongoDB
description: Build production-ready REST APIs using Express.js and MongoDB Atlas.
